summary: Just a small (very very tiny) change I made to the thalmor clothing. Actual good enchantments now. It has for long bugged me that great high elves wear such badly enchanted armor.
descriptionHtml:
There isn't much to it, this mod only changes the enchant of the Thalmor clothes to something more suitable for a wizard. (A sneaky wizard)


Thalmor robes ~ -20% cost off of destruction spells, magicka regenerates 125% faster
Hooded Thalmor robes ~ -22% cost off of destruction spells, magicka regenerates 150% faster
Thalmor gloves ~ -15% cost off of destruction spells
Thalmor boots ~ muffled movement


Credit
Bethesda for TESV: Skyrim and CK


Crediting
I claim no credit of this, it would take you so little time to make your own that I don't care if you use mine for any purpose whatsoever. Go nuts


(Is there already a mod that does this? Let me know)
author: XBitu
